title: American_Top_40_February_4th,_1978
description:
American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This rebroadcast is one of many I have recorded from internet radio. Some are incomplete but most are not and I hope you enjoy these as much as I do.
In this broadcast:

Casey calls one artist, "The First Lady of Love."
Casey answers the question, "Who has had the most hits in one calander year?"
One songwriter has 4 songs in the top 10, something that hasn't happened since the Beatles.
Last weeks number one gets knocked out of positiion by the act they knocked out to get there; something that hasn't happened in 20 years.
